summary: Completed comprehensive testing of e-commerce UI with backend API and frontend integration. Backend APIs working correctly with 8 clothing products. Frontend UI flows functional but cart persistence issue identified.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 520 error for invalid product ID instead of graceful error handling
minor_bugs.impact: Poor error handling for non-existent products

critical_bugs.issue: Cart persistence not working - localStorage cleared on page refresh
critical_bugs.details: useEffect that saves to localStorage runs before useEffect that loads from localStorage, overwriting saved cart data with empty array
critical_bugs.affected_functionality: Cart items lost on page refresh

ui_bugs.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent

passed_tests: Product listing displays 8 clothing products correctly
Add to cart from product listing page works
Product details page navigation and display
Add to cart from product details page
Cart sidebar opens and displays items
Cart page navigation and item display
Checkout page navigation and order summary

success_percentage.backend: 80% (4/5 tests passed - minor error handling issue)
success_percentage.frontend: 90% (15/16 major features working - cart persistence issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix cart persistence issue in CartContext.js - the useEffect that saves to localStorage should not run on initial mount to prevent overwriting loaded cart data. Consider adding a flag to track initial load or restructuring the useEffect dependencies.
